Articles.Content:
is there any way i could get my hands on version .10?

This was the first version i played and i would love to keep a copy around for giggles/perspective

is this something that would be possible?

Not likely, there is no official archive of past versions. That said, Harv has mentioned the possibility of making previous versions available in the future.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
I\'ve got a copy, but I\'m not going to give it out until I get the okay from someone at Squad. If that happens here, I\'ll PM you a link. Otherwise, sorry.

It\'s near the bottom of this page.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=1871.390
